sentences.en: After the singer sang the melodious Jasnine Flower, I an appreciative whistle.

sentences.en: I can see why. They are skillful and melodious . Truly inspiring music.

sentences.en: I was obsessed with the melodious tone and the beautiful clothes.

sentences.en: Nora: She sang a very melodious folk song too , didn't she?

sentences.en: This aria is soft and melodious.
You look like a melodious madrigal, beautiful snowy mountain, beautiful prairie.
sentences.cn: 你象一只悠扬的牧歌, 美了雪山, 美了草原.

words.tran_cn: 使调子优美，使悦耳动听

trans.tran_cn: 有旋律的，产生旋律的，悦耳的，和谐，悠扬
trans.tran_en: something that sounds melodious sounds like music or has a pleasant tune
